FuncDef:
The monitor-location-group command configures an HA status monitoring group.
The undo monitor-location-group command deletes an HA status monitoring group.
By default, no HA status monitoring group is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Monitor-location-group name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In CGN cold backup scenarios, a device can get aware of CGN board faults and trigger master/slave switchovers after it is associated with an HA status monitoring group. To configure an HA status monitoring group, run the monitor-location-group command.
Follow-up Procedure
After an HA status monitoring group is created, an HA backup group needs to be specified and associated with the HA status monitoring group in the interface view.
Precautions
The monitor-location-group command only takes effect on VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400 series boards.
